main.track: Bullet Proof.. I Wish I Was

comments.comment: Great show. My fave radiohead show of all time that I have attended, out of 6. Most likely due to my proximity to the band in a 500 person club. Great setlist right after OKC came out and the only fumbling came during 'let down'. unsurprisingly ,they couldn't really play it. i can't remember how many encores, but for the last one, a good number of people had cleared out and i was able to go right to the rail and watch thom do a solo, amazing 'thinking about you' acoustic. great show, great fans. only show in southeast us that year and the fans were the cream of the crop....everyone knew okc well and sang along and good discussions before and after. kinda been dissapointed since. have seen them also: 2001-stone mountain,ga 2003-field day fest, nj 2003- camden, nj 2003- msg (twice), nyc with only the 2001 and first msg sets coming close
